document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70fc70">drink </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa06e">Sue, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#684044">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">you </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffd04c">tasted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Though </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#684044">cooler </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70fc70">Water </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa06e">Thoughtfulness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffd04c">Thirst </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
